EmailTemplate.name: CR 4.2.1 Reminder to book assessment
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We have noticed that you have not yet booked onto any of our assessment dates for the 2015 NCS programmes.
Booking an Assessment
To view a list of our available assessment dates simply login to the Staffing Website and head to the 'Booking Assessments' section. Here, you will be able to:
See a list of available dates
-Book onto an assessment -Review details of your chosen assessment date -Request alternative dates by submitting a form*
* Please note: we will try to offer you an alternative assessment date but unfortunately this is not always possible.
Click here to book onto an assessment: https://staffing.the-challenge.org/secure/BookingAssessmentsSummary.aspx
If you no longer wish to be part of the assessment process, please confirm that you would like to withdraw in writing to the email address below.
If you have any questions please contact me, quoting the email reference number below in any correspondence.
Best Wishes
The Challenge
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Email Reference: CR 4.2.1
